subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In 1981, after George Steinbrenner had made David Winfield baseball’s highest-paid player, came the World Series — with a bad performance by Winfield and a worse one by Steinbrenner.
snippet: In 1981, after George Steinbrenner had made David Winfield baseball’s highest-paid player, came the World Series — with a bad performance by Winfield and a worse one by Steinbrenner.
